message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that you've expressed interest in. I'm asking for $175 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $120 is just too low for me.  How about we split the difference and I come down to $145?  That seems fair considering the value of this product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $145 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $130?
